member.name: T:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal
member.summary: Signal object interface used to represent an electromagnetic signal.

member.name: M:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.ComputePolLoss(AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRPolarization)
member.summary: Computes the rotation angle for the receive side polarization.

member.name: M:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.ComputePolRotationAngle(AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRPolarization)
member.summary: Computes the rotation angle for the receive side polarization.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.Time
member.summary: Gets the signal time in epoch seconds.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.Frequency
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal frequency in Hz.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.UpperBandLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal upper bandwidth limit in Hz.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.LowerBandLimit
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal lower bandwidth limit in Hz.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.Power
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal power in Watts.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignal.Polarization
member.summary: Gets or sets the signal polarization

member.name: T:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRPolarization
member.summary: Polarization object interface used to represent a signal polarization.

member.name: T:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignalCollection
member.summary: Interface implemented by a collection of signal objects.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignalCollection.Count
member.summary: Returns the number of elements in the collection.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignalCollection.Item
member.summary: Given an index, returns an element in the collection.

member.name: P:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRSignalCollection._NewEnum
member.summary: Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the collection.

member.name: T:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRPolarizationElliptical
member.summary: Elliptical polarization object interface used to represent elliptical signal polarization.

member.name: T:AGI.CommRdrFoundation.IAgCRPolarizationLinear
member.summary: Linear polarization object interface used to represent linear signal polarization.
